meanings.definition: The slow, downhill movement of soil and rock material due to the freezing and thawing of water.
meanings.sent1: Solifluctions can cause the ground to slowly slide down the hill.
meanings.sent2: The solifluctions in this area have created interesting patterns on the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The solifluctions seemed to be playing a game of freeze and slide.
meanings.sent4: The solifluctions resembled a giant blanket slowly creeping down the slope.
meanings.sent5: The solifluctions were like a slow-motion dance of earth and water.

meanings.definition: The process by which solifluction occurs.

meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the solifluctions to learn more about erosion.
meanings.sent3: The solifluctions seemed to be whispering secrets about the land.
